title: Turitors
description: Users can add, edit, and remove assignments using Turitors. In order to provide effective assignment management and assessment experiences, evaluators can mark assignments and offer feedback. It utilizes React.js for dynamic interfaces, MongoDB for data storage, Express.js/Node.js for the backend, JWT for security, Firebase services, and Tailwind CSS for styling.
technology: Reactjs, Tailwindcss, Node.js, Express.js, Mongodb, Firebase, JWT, TanStackQuery

title: Small Lakeview Cottage
description: Created a website with three roles: Users maintain profiles and read announcements, Admins control coupons and announcements, and Members handle payments. Simple communication for all parties! Safe login, effective rental agreements, flexible administrative tools, adaptable design, conquering obstacles, and ideal parallel filtering.
technology: Reactjs, Tailwindcss, Node.js, Express.js, Mongodb, Firebase, JWT, React-Hook-form, TanStackQuery

title: partdo
description: Explore our React-based car marketplace. Log in for a personalized experience – add, update, or delete cars in your cart effortlessly. Enjoy a user-friendly interface, making your car-buying journey seamless and convenient. Discover, choose, and make your purchase with ease on our website.
technology: Reactjs, Tailwindcss, Node.js, Express.js, Mongodb, Firebase, TanStackQuery
